title: Where can I get a custom, aesthetic stamp made?
selftext:
This is something I have longed for, ever since I was a child, to setup my own small library at home.I need something like this, made of wood, for my library. [https://www.etsy.com/in-en/listing/667076640/book-stamp-library-stamp-custom-library](https://www.etsy.com/in-en/listing/667076640/book-stamp-library-stamp-custom-library)

I am afraid this might get stuck in customs if I order it from etsy, so need a local vendor preferably in NCR.Please help me with any leads.
comments: You can try this store, I had stumbled upon it on Instagram https://aliciasouza.com/collections/custom-stamps/products/custom-library-stamp
